plot: A man named Ian Hamon is being hunted down by the Verrat's agent Edgar Waltz and is wounded at Portland's bus station by a bullet and loses his backpack. Waltz meets Captain Renard seeking for help to capture Ian but his request is turned down. Meanwhile, Ian, who belongs to the Wesen Resistance, goes to the spice shop and Rosalee, who was his lover in the past, calls Monroe to help her to remove the bullet. Waltz kills a man and leaves Ian's passport in the crime scene to force Renard to chase him. When Nick arrives at the spice shop, he tries to arrest Ian, but Rosalee and Monroe testify that he was unconscious with them when the man was murdered. Soon Waltz confronts Nick while Ian needs a new passport to leave the country. Nick has to make a decision and cross the line as a police detective.—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

While investigating a string of murders, Nick and Hank learn that their suspect's crime wave began overseas. When Nick discovers the suspect is being harbored by none other than Monroe and Rosalee, he realizes he's hunting the hunted, a freedom fighter trying desperately to escape the clutches of a creature bounty hunter.—NBC Publicity
